Package net.sourceforge.reb4j

Regular Expression Builder for Java

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CharClass Specialization of Regex representing a character class expression.
Regex Represents a regular expression as defined by the Pattern class.
 

Enum Summary
Flag This enumeration represents flags that may be embedded into regular expressions.
QuantifierMode Enumerates the types of quantifiers supported by Pattern.
